short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes YouTube theater mode to resemble Twitch theater mode when chat is enabled

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TTM expands the main video view and moves the chat box to the right hand side. Additionally, all other on-screen elements get hidden. All changes revert upon leaving theater mode.

Leave a comment in the reviews if things bug out and I'll fix them over time. 👍

v5.01 Updated  March 7: fix for chatbox being short or hidden when window is narrow
v5.00 Updated March 2024: made modifications accounting for YouTube's Theater Mode Update
v4.00 Updated June 2023! 🥳🎉
